PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-08462020-10-30,  CNSC,  NRCAN,  ,  ,  , 
ActNuclear Safety and Control Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Regulations Made Under the Nuclear Safety and Control Act (Radiation Protection)
PrecisRegulations Amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE NUCLEAR SAFETY AND CONTROL ACT (RADIATION PROTECTION) in order to harmonize the Regulations with updated International Commission on Radiological Protection (ICRP) recommendations and International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA) guidance, to clarify requirements, and to address gaps identified since 2000.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0237 Publication Date: 2020-11-25
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending Certain Regulations Made Under the Nuclear Safety and Control Act (Radiation Protection)
precis: Regulations Amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE NUCLEAR SAFETY AND CONTROL ACT (RADIATION PROTECTION) in order to harmonize the Regulations with updated International Commission on Radiological Protection (ICRP) recommendations and International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA) guidance, to clarify requirements, and to address gaps identified since 2000.
